static aim.description: Aiming shots while standing still i.e static sg routes, eg routes, spiderman

dynamic aim.description: Aiming shots while moving i.e. peeks, flings, non-static sg routes

accelerated movement.description: Controlling speed, circlestrafes, toggleduck tech, etc.

strafe movement.description: Having good sync, basically. Primarily used in bhopping but also funtitled and impossible strafe

oob tech.description: Pulling off strats such as PQRs, aiming shots at difficult to see geometry, executing crazy under ele strats, etc.

saveload abuse.description: Anything and everything to do with abusing saves and loads. Timing SLs, getting saveglitch, etc.
